overview: Sacha Borovitch, the Boss of a drug dealers’ international organisation, is working in France through his contact Ian, also known in the underworld as “le Français”. Since the first time he has decided working in France, he has kept on defying the police organisation. Drug addict, unpredictable in all his decisions, and even dangerous for his circle, nevertheless he has his weakness: his excessive taste for sex and beautiful women.  Taking opportunity of this “secret” information, Tony and his anti gang squad is trying to infiltrate this organisation thanks to 2 gorgeous and “professional” girls: Katsumi already compared as the most provocative and attractive agent of the squad and Yasmine, a novice with really good “capacities”…
title: French Connexion
